item.description:
Staying on track with our regular sarging day.

Most everyone will be out this night because no one works the next day and they most likely have a family BBQ. It'll be like a Thanksgiving-eve night.

It'll be either Hartford, New Haven, or Springfield. Post some comments and I'll choose the location Weds. night; the most votes will win. Cast a vote by commenting.
item.name: Pre-July 4th Sarge
